data.name: DCS: Marianas
data.detailed_description:
DCS: Marianas

This map will initially only be available from the Open Beta DCS Word Steam Edition.

Since the release of DCS World, the sole free map has been the Caucasus Map. Although a great map and the recipient of significant updates, we now offer the DCS: Mariana Islands Map for FREE. For this new map, we have used our latest map technologies and provide a vastly different combat environment in a new part of the world. The map includes the following features:

  • A very large ocean area with a few islands. Ideal for carrier operations.
  • Islands that are situated such that airfields have natural red, blue, and contested locations.
  • Home to the largest USAF base in the south Pacific.
  • Feasible for US, Russia, and China operations in the Pacific.
  • Take advantage of the Chinese Assets Pack.

The Mariana Islands is a massive 1,500 x 1,500 km map with the option to expand further in the future. Home to one of the largest USAF airbases in the region, Anderson AFB on Guam serves as an anchor of US forces in the Pacific region, but it is within reach of both Chinese and Russian Pacific forces to the north. The same island chain also served as the backdrop of the World War II battles of Guam, Saipan, and Rota, as well as the carrier vs. carrier Mariana Islands battle.
At release, the following islands will be included and modelled at an extreme level of accuracy using our latest map and graphics technologies:

Guam

  • Anderson AFB.
  • Weapons storage bunkers northwest of Anderson AFB.
  • Ordnance Annex in south central next to Santa Rita.
  • Antenna array installation on west coast.
  • Antonio B. Won Pat International Airport.
  • Abandoned Northwest Airfield in northeast corner of island.
  • Abandoned Orote Airfield at Crote Pointe.
  • US Naval station and Guam Port Authority at Apra Habor / Sumay.
  • Fort Soledad and Fort Juan Muna.
  • Urban areas of Talofofo, Yona, Tumon, Yigo, Maggilao, Asbeco, Dededo, Inarajan, Santa Rita, Agat, Piti, Asan, Hagatna, Barrigada, Magilao, and Adacao, Agana Heights, Asan-Maina, Chalan-Pago-Ordot, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, and Umatac.
  • University of Guam.
  • Leo Palace Resort.

Saipan

  • Saipan International Airport.
  • Port of Puerto Rico.
  • Urban centers of Kagman, San Roque, Tanapag, Garapan, San Vucente, Dandan, Chalan Kiya, Susupe, Chalan Kanoa, Afetna, and Chalan Kiya.
  • Golf courses at Agingan, Kagman, and eastern end and east end along eastern coast.
  • Memorial at east end.

Tinian

  • Tinian International Airport.
  • Abandoned airfield at north end of island.
  • Urban areas of San Jose / harbor and Marpo Heights.
  • Antenna array along central west coast of the island.

Rota

  • Rota International Airport.
  • Urban areas of Sinapalu, Songsong, and Teneto Village.
  • Golf course on northern coast of island.
  • Abandoned weapon storage area on east end of island.

Farallon de Medinilla

  • Air-to-ground weapons training range

We are very excited to bring this new, free map to you in 2021 that will offer new gameplay, a home to new units, and a new chapter for DCS World.

data.short_description: We now offer the DCS: Marianas for FREE. For this new map, we have used our latest map technologies and provide a vastly different combat environment in a new part of the world.

pc_requirements.minimum: Minimum system requirements (LOW graphics preset settings): OS 64-bit Windows 8/10; DirectX11; CPU: Core i5+ at 3+ GHz or AMD FX / Ryzen; RAM: 16 GB (32 GB for heavy missions); Free hard disk space: 120 GB on Solid State Drive (SSD); Discrete video card NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX VEGA 56 with 8GB VRAM or better; Joystick; requires internet activation.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended system requirements (HIGH graphics preset settings): OS 64-bit Windows 8/10; DirectX11; CPU: Core i5+ at 4+ GHz or AMD FX / Ryzen; RAM: 16 GB (32 GB for heavy missions); Free hard disk space: 120 GB on Solid State Drive (SSD); Discrete video card NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX VEGA 64 or better; Joystick; requires internet activation.

Recommended VR systems requirements (VR graphics settings): OS 64-bit Windows 8/10; DirectX11; CPU: Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 3700X or better; RAM: 32 GB; Free hard disk space: 120 GB on Solid State Drive (SSD); Discrete video card NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2080 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or better; Joystick; requires internet activation.

data.legal_notice: All rights reserved. (c) 2021 Eagle Dynamics SA
